specification:

 Material: Aluminum.

description:
SPACE SAVING EASY INSTALLATION. Our 4 inch low profile, ultra-thin surface mount only needs 2 inches clearance of ceiling space. Our recessed light is perfect for new construction installation, with no recessed can required. Each light comes with an ultra slim junction box with easy push-in wire connectors, spring loaded clips, a cable, and a cut out template.,
 IC-RATED AIRTIGHT: The Parmida Slim Panel Downlight is IC-Rated for direct contact with insulation to prevent air conditioning or heating from leaking out of the home.,
 QUALITY AND SAFETY ASSURED: ETL-Listed. This product meets strict requirements to be considered safe and reliable. With the latest DOB LED Technology, these lights are instant start with no flickering or humming.

name: PARMIDA (12 Pack) 4 Inch - Thin LED
specification:

description:
5 COLOR TEMPERATURE SWITCH: Set the color temperature of your lights to the desired level with a simple flip of a switch on the junction box. Choose between Warm White (2700K), Soft White (3000K), Neutral White (3500K), Cool White (4000K), and Day Light (5000K).,
 GIMBAL/EYEBALL DESIGN: Range of motion: 360° tilt. This canless Eyeball slim panel downlight is perfect for sloped ceilings or where directional lighting is desired; the light can pivot for where illumination is most wanted.,
 DIMMABLE: With 100-5% dimming capability, you can set the mood and ensure the perfect level of light in your space. Our lights are compatible with most LED dimmers.

name: LUXRITE 3 Inch Square LED - Ceiling Light
specification:

description:
5 COLOR ADJUSTABLE - Built with a tunable 5 cct color temperature switch so you can pick the ideal colored light for your space. During installation you can toggle the color switch on the LED recessed lights from 2700K warm white, 3000K soft white, 3500K natural white, 4000K cool white, or 5000K bright white.,
 HIGH BRIGHTNESS - Each 3 inch LED recessed light offers 800 lumens of brighter lighting while using only 10 watts of power. Standard 3 inch square recessed lighting can't match up to these high output regressed lights which are equivalent to typical 60 watt light bulbs which means you'll cut electricity costs while having the brightest lighting for your space.,
 DIMMABLE - Control the brightness of your LED downlight with it's smooth dimming feature that can be reduced from 100% to 10% lighting output with a dimmer. Adjust your high hat lighting to your preferred setting so you have just the perfect amount of lighting needed. With a wet location and IC rating, these 3 recess lights are ideal for new and old construction, remodel, soffit, eaves, and any indoor and outdoor location.

 The lamp has a fairly simple circular design with a 2-spoke Jack, light weight 38g will not occupy the area of other plugs. The brand name Mijia is prominently printed on the front of the lamp.,
 The peculiarity of the lamp is that it is equipped with intelligent sensor technology. the Mijia Sensor Night Light is also equipped with a hidden spring touch switch and can be controlled off with just 1 light touch.

 🌈16M Color Backdrop 🌈 The fairy lights curtain has 16M colors and a variety of colored lights to choose from, whether you want pink curtain lights or white curtain lights, dynamic or static lights, are stunning background lighting for Christmas decorations outdoor yard.

 C7 Christmas String Light: 25ft green wire string with 25 bulbs which is so clear that you can see its filament inside. For each C7 clear bulb, the lifespan reaches 2,500-hour. 2 spare bulbs for replacement, just in case some of the bulbs were broken during the transit.
 Practical and Flexible: 5 amp fuse that will stand up to normal weather presented and also can be used safely indoors/outdoors on a Christmas tree.

name: Multi Ceramic Christmas String Light
specification:
Color: Multicolor.
 Light Source Type: LED.
 Indoor/Outdoor Usage: Outdoor, Indoor.
 Power Source: Corded Electric.
description:
Enjoy our retro fit traditional C9 light set with a 25' Black wire string and 25 ceramic opaque C9 light bulbs during the holidays, on your patio, gazebo, pergola, or special event. This light set is commonly referred as 'retro' because it will remind you of the old fashioned type Christmas lighting that you would use on house or Christmas tree reminiscent of the 1950's holiday decorations. Still classic to this day!!!.
 Each classic C9 bulb is 7 watts and made for 120V and comes with a ceramic glass that is remisnicent of old fashioned Christmas decorations. Every C9 bulb is rated for a 3,000 hour life span and will fit into any C9/E17 socket base. We highly recommend purchasing an extra box of bulbs to have on hand to be used for replacements when the time comes (ASIN B004Q6JFBY).
 Each set is connectable end to end three times for a total of 75' on one plug! Perfect and versatile for any roofline or outdoor patio application that needs a short length or the ability to have a longer length on one plug. The string is made of a high quality 20 AWG wire and a 5 amp fuse that will stand up to any weather presented and also can be used safely indoors on a Christmas tree.
